TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name = 'flink'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($6, _UTF-16LE'flink')]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'flink')]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name <> 'beam' AND LookupTable.name <> 'spark'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<>($6, _UTF-16LE'beam'), <>($6, _UTF-16LE'spark'))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<>($2, _UTF-16LE'beam'), <>($2, _UTF-16LE'spark'))]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name = 'beam' OR LookupTable.name = 'spark'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($6, _UTF-16LE'beam'), =($6, _UTF-16LE'spark'))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($2, _UTF-16LE'beam'), =($2, _UTF-16LE'spark'))]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[]]])

TestCase.name: testCanPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.age > 10

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($4, 10)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[greaterThan(age, 10)]]])

TestCase.name: testComplicatedPartialPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name = 'flink' AND LookupTable.age > 10 AND ScanTable.content <> 'flink'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($6, _UTF-16LE'flink'), >($4, 10), <>($2, _UTF-16LE'flink'))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalFilter(condition=[<>($2, _UTF-16LE'flink')]) : +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'flink')]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[greaterThan(age, 10)]]])

TestCase.name: testFullyPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.age < 100 AND LookupTable.age > 10

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($4, 100), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[and(lessThan(age, 100), greaterThan(age, 10))]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name = 'flink' AND LookupTable.age > 10

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($6, _UTF-16LE'flink'), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'flink')]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[greaterThan(age, 10)]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDown2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.name = 'flink' OR LookupTable.age > 10

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($6, _UTF-16LE'flink'), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($2, _UTF-16LE'flink'), >($0, 10))]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[]]])

TestCase.name: testUnconvertedExpression
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE LookupTable.age < 100 AND LookupTable.age > 10 AND CAST(LookupTable.price AS BIGINT) < 1000

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($4, 100), >($4, 10), <(CAST($8):BIGINT, 1000))]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<(CAST($4):BIGINT, 1000)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[and(lessThan(age, 100), greaterThan(age, 10))]]])

TestCase.name: testWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ScanTable.id, ScanTable.len, LookupTable.age, LookupTable.name, LookupTable.info FROM ScanTable JOIN LookupTable FOR system_time AS OF ScanTable.proctime ON ScanTable.id = LookupTable.id WHERE UPPER(LookupTable.info) = 'test'

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6], info=[$7]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(UPPER($7), _UTF-16LE'test')]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.id, $1)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], age=[$4], name=[$6], info=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$0], len=[$1], content=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ScanTable]]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, filter=[equals(upper(info), 'test')]]])
